sentence: well the little boy's in the cookie jar .
and he's about to fall on the floor because the stool's tilted .
she's not paying attention (be)cause the sink's runnin(g) over .
the little girl I think is begging her brother to give her a cookie .
must be summer time because the window's open .
you can see the grass and shrubbery outside .
and see a few dishes that mom has already dried .
